title: Wind on the Charles
body: Ran along the river. The wind felt sharp but freeing. Thought about resilience and rhythm.

title: Quiet morning in Adams
body: Made tea, opened my notebook. Wrote about stillness. The pages felt like old friends.

title: Stat 110 office hours
body: Talked to Joe about conditional probability. The logic clicked for once.

title: Rain and reading Woolf
body: Spent the afternoon with Woolf's diaries. Her language feels like walking underwater.
